name: No Clothing for Old Men
description:
Select the best combination of stats and starting-position to gather your clothes and escape the old folk's home in as few runs as possible.

How to play :

1. Roll the dice (by clicking "Roll the Dice")

2. Drag the dices on the stats to modify them

3. Choose the starting location of your character

4. Start the run !

Objectif : 

The objectif is to collect the 5 clothing-items on the map with a minimum of runs as possible.
